resources.string: You\'re a policeman. Try to catch the thief.
You\'re a policeman. Try to catch the robber.
You\'re a robber and the policeman is trying to catch the thief. You\'re safe.
You\'re a robber and the policeman is trying to catch you. You\'re in danger.
You\'re a thief and the policeman is trying to catch you. You\'re in danger.
You\'re a thief and the policeman is trying to catch the robber. You\'re safe.
You have successfully caught the thief
You aren\'t smart enough to catch the thief
You have successfully caught the robber
You aren\'t smart enough to catch the robber
